subject: Football
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: Sunday’s game between the Chicago Bears and the San Francisco 49ers showed just how entangled the N.F.L.’s manufactured world of make-believe is with the hard realities of American life.
snippet: Sunday’s game between the Chicago Bears and the San Francisco 49ers showed just how entangled the N.F.L.’s manufactured world of make-believe is with the hard realities of American life.
